    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    play_game(fr.umlv.zen5.ApplicationContext context, SimpleGameData data)
    Goes once in the game loop, which consists in retrieving user actions, transmissing it to the GameView and GameData, and dealing with time events.

  • Method Details

    • play_game

      void play_game(fr.umlv.zen5.ApplicationContext context, SimpleGameData data)
      Goes once in the game loop, which consists in retrieving user actions, transmissing it to the GameView and GameData, and dealing with time events.
      Parameters:
      context - ApplicationContext of the game.
      data - GameData of the game.
